samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The Masked Textbox allows users to enter only the valid input based on the provided mask format such as Phone number, Country ISO code, Date, Time and so on.

samples.name: Custom Mask
samples.description: The custom mask is done using custom characters as mask elements. Time format and IP address fields are achieved using the custom mask literals and regex.

samples.name: Formats
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the usage of different mask formats through the properties panel. You can also get the value and raw value of the masked textbox.
